##select
>Des  Select下拉框选择组件

```
import React, {Component} from 'react';
import style from './index.css';

export default class Select extends Component {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        this.state = {value: props.defaultValue || ''};
    }

    render() {
        let {className="select", options=[],styleCss={}} = this.props;

        let opts = options.map(function (v, index) {
            return (<option key={index} value={v.id}>{v.name}</option>)
        });
        return (
            <select value={this.state.value}
                    className={style[className]}
                    style={styleCss}
                    onChange={ e => this.changeHandle(e) }
                    onFocus={e => this.focusHandle(e)}
                    onBlur={e => this.blurHandle(e)}>
                <option value="">全部</option>
                {this.props.children}
                {opts}
            </select>
        )
    }

    componentWillReceiveProps(nextProps) {
        if ((nextProps.defaultValue != null) && (this.props.defaultValue !== nextProps.defaultValue)) {
            this.setState({value: nextProps.defaultValue});
        }
    }

    focusHandle(e) {
        this.props.focusEvent && this.props.focusEvent()
    }

    blurHandle(e) {
        this.props.blurEvent && this.props.blurEvent()
    }

    changeHandle(e) {
        let currentValue = e.target.value;
        let {onChange}  = this.props;
        this.setState({value: currentValue}, function () {
            onChange && onChange(currentValue);
        })
    }

    getValue() {
        return this.state.value;
    }

    // 返回的是选中的option的key value值（对象）
    getAllValue() {
        let options = this.props.options || [],
            currentValue = this.state.value,
            aimValue = {id:'',name:''};

        for (let i = 0; i < options.length; i++) {
            if (options[i].id == currentValue) {
                aimValue = options[i];
            }
        }

        return aimValue;
    }
}
```

## params 

`options`   		下拉框的选项,必须是一个数组（[{id:'',name:''}]）

`defaultValue`		下拉框的默认值		

`onChange`			下拉框改变触发的事件

`blurEvent`			下拉框失焦事件

`focusEvent`		下拉框的获取焦点事件
